entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, who is being threatened by Voldemort.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The antagonist of the story, who is trying to intimidate Harry.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: A group of followers of Voldemort, who are laughing at Harry's refusal.

entities.name: cruciatus curse
entities.description: A curse that has left Harry with aches all over his body.

relationships.description: Voldemort is threatening Harry with pain and death.
The Death Eaters are followers of Voldemort.
Harry has been affected by the Cruciatus Curse, which has left him with aches all over his body.
Voldemort is trying to intimidate Harry.
